verses.text: \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w ministry|strong="G1248"\w* \w that|strong="G1510"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* done towards \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*, \w it|strong="G1510"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w superfluous|strong="G4053"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w write|strong="G1125"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5210"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w I|strong="G3739"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* forward \w mind|strong="G2532"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G3739"\w* \w boast|strong="G2744"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Macedonians|strong="G3110"\w*. \w That|strong="G3754"\w* \w Achaia|strong="G0882"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G3739"\w* ready \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w year|strong="G4070"\w* past, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* emulation hath provoked \w very|strong="G4183"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G1510"\w* \w sent|strong="G3992"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w thing|strong="G3778"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w boast|strong="G2745"\w* \w of|strong="G1722"\w* \w concerning|strong="G5228"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w made|strong="G2758"\w* \w void|strong="G2758"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w behalf|strong="G5228"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* (\w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G1510"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*) \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w may|strong="G2443"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* ready:

\w Lest|strong="G3361"\w*, \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Macedonians|strong="G3110"\w* \w shall|strong="G3778"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w me|strong="G3004"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w find|strong="G2147"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w unprepared|strong="G0532"\w*, \w we|strong="G2249"\w* (\w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* ye) \w should|strong="G2443"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* ashamed \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* matter.

\w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w thought|strong="G2233"\w* \w it|strong="G2233"\w* \w necessary|strong="G0316"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* desire \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w they|strong="G3767"\w* \w would|strong="G2532"\w* \w go|strong="G4281"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w before|strong="G1519"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* prepare \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w blessing|strong="G2129"\w* \w before|strong="G1519"\w* \w promised|strong="G4279"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w ready|strong="G2092"\w*, \w so|strong="G2443"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w blessing|strong="G2129"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w covetousness|strong="G4124"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* say: \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* soweth \w sparingly|strong="G5340"\w*, \w shall|strong="G3778"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w reap|strong="G2325"\w* \w sparingly|strong="G5340"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* soweth \w in|strong="G1909"\w* blessings, \w shall|strong="G3778"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w reap|strong="G2325"\w* blessings.

\w Every|strong="G1538"\w* \w one|strong="G1538"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w he|strong="G2316"\w* hath determined \w in|strong="G2316"\w* \w his|strong="G0025"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w with|strong="G1537"\w* \w sadness|strong="G3077"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w necessity|strong="G0318"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* loveth \w a|strong="G2228"\w* \w cheerful|strong="G2431"\w* \w giver|strong="G1395"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G2316"\w* \w able|strong="G1414"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w make|strong="G4052"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w abound|strong="G4052"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*; \w that|strong="G2443"\w* ye \w always|strong="G3842"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w sufficiency|strong="G0841"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w*, \w may|strong="G2443"\w* \w abound|strong="G4052"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w*,

\w As|strong="G2531"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w*: \w He|strong="G0846"\w* hath dispersed abroad, \w he|strong="G0846"\w* hath \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w poor|strong="G3993"\w*: \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w justice|strong="G1343"\w* remaineth \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G1161"\w* ministereth \w seed|strong="G4690"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w sower|strong="G4687"\w*, \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w both|strong="G2532"\w* \w give|strong="G2023"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w bread|strong="G0740"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* eat, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w multiply|strong="G4129"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w seed|strong="G4690"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w increase|strong="G4129"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w growth|strong="G0837"\w* \w of|strong="G1343"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* fruits \w of|strong="G1343"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w justice|strong="G1343"\w*:

\w That|strong="G3748"\w* being \w enriched|strong="G4148"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w*, \w you|strong="G1722"\w* \w may|strong="G3956"\w* abound unto \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w simplicity|strong="G0572"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* worketh \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w us|strong="G1519"\w* \w thanksgiving|strong="G2169"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Because|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* administration \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* office doth \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* supply \w the|strong="G3588"\w* want \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* aboundeth \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w thanksgivings|strong="G2169"\w* \w in|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2316"\w*,

\w By|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w proof|strong="G1382"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w ministry|strong="G1248"\w*, \w glorifying|strong="G1392"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w obedience|strong="G5292"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w your|strong="G1392"\w* \w confession|strong="G3671"\w* unto \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w simplicity|strong="G0572"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w your|strong="G1392"\w* communicating unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* unto \w all|strong="G3956"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* praying \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w being|strong="G4771"\w* desirous \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w because|strong="G1223"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* excellent \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*.
\w Thanks|strong="G5485"\w* \w be|strong="G2316"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w for|strong="G1909"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* unspeakable \w gift|strong="G1431"\w*.
